messages.subject: thought re: "special" children
messages.msgSnippet: (as if ALL children aren t special in their own ways!! ANYWAY) I was thinking...if one of my children had Down s Syndrome or something, we wouldn t be seeking
messages.messageBody:
(as if ALL children aren't special in their own ways!! ANYWAY)

I was thinking...if one of my children had Down's Syndrome or something, we wouldn't be seeking to do anything but help them to be their best, to encourage them every step of the way, etc. We wouldn't be expecting them to do ANYTHING before they are 100% ready to do that...

So why can it be so hard to do the same for our children who are "normal?!"

It has had me sitting back and re-evaluating EVERYTHING which is good I suppose...

MamaBeth


Why not?!
